texts.text: Good day.
Catch anything?
I'm trying to find my bracelet...
Hold on, I've got something!
I know this hemisphere very well, for 10 Kashes I'll tell you what FunFrock is concocting here.
Our leaders don't know that we come here, it's the only place where we can put these blasted helmets down. I'm here for business only: I can sell you information about anything. See you later...

Did you know that there is a means of getting to Fortress island in my basement? I'll let you in there if you improve the quality of the show. The atmosphere is terrible nowadays, the patrons are bummed out.
That's much better, go on it! But be careful - there are still a few giant crabs. Thanks again!
With an atmosphere like this, I'm gonna be rich!
Our group is sort of lacking: we don't have half the material we need, and we're eight hit songs short of an album. I'm begging you: find a guitar for me!
I must be hallucinating, look, he found the Space Guitar!
I think we've got a hit here, thanks pal!
No more gas.
L.B.A. @ Funky-Town sewer service
L.B.A. @ Funky-Town sewer service @ Swindler street
L.B.A. @ Funky-Town sewer service @ Dino-Fly street

Good day. Let's see, you can talk to me and you're wearing the Medallion of Sendell: you must be the Heir! I've been waiting for you for centuries and I've got a backache so we'll go carefully. The Hamalayi mountains are too high for me but I can lead you through this entire hemisphere, except for Polar island: it is too well guarded by FunFrock. Where do you want to go?
Where do you want to go Twinsen?
I don't know where they are.
Where do you want to go?
To Brundle island.
To Fortress island.
To the Hamalayi mountains.
I'm staying here.
Ask one of the helmet-less groboclones, they come here to traffic and listen to music.
I'm non-violent.
Ha ha, I was the watchman on the construction site of the Teleportation Center. So for 50 Kashes I can tell you EXACTLY where those plans are.
Thief, that's too expensive!
Sold!
You don't have enough Kashes, my poor little quetch.

The plans for this center are in FunFrock's personal safe. In his headquarters on Principal island. But to get in you must be able to defeat the Supergros (the nurses equipped with tablet launchers!).
Hi, nice weather huh?
I refuse to fight when I'm not on duty.
So, which one of FunFrock's factories do you want information about?
I don't givre credit, come back when you're richer!
The mutant factory.

FunFrock cleared out the populations from this hemisphere but there are still a few people that resist like here in Funky-Town. He produces mutant insects in his factory at the foot of the Hamalayi mountains to exterminate us. The factory was supposedly sabotaged, but there are still monsters in the sewers: they were produced before the sabotage. In fact, you can jump on the giant crabs!
The Teleportation Center.
It is located on Brundle island, from there FunFrock's cohorts control all the planet's teleportations! The entrance is guarded but they will let you in if you act like one of them.
The Cloning center.

The center where all the planet's clones are produced is inside FunFrock's Fortress. It's his headquarters when he is in this hemisphere. Be careful because I heard that he is working on some VERY special clones, it's on Fortress island.
See you later.
That type of information is too specific, ask one of the helmet-less groboclones that are here instead.
Your hydroglider is great! But you won't make it to Fortress island or to Polar island with it. They are isolated by the currents, no ship can find them. You need a Dino-Fly to go there.
Ask the rabbibunny with the sunglasses, he's an informer.
Good day
I'm looking for the plans for the Teleportation Center.
Calm down, I'll only let you in if the audience likes the group. Work it out with the guitarist!
Ask the rabbibunny with the sunglasses who is at the entrance to Funky-Town, he's an informer.
Those guys on stage are fabulous! @ But it's too bad that they don't play anything.
Wow! Never heard anything like that before, they are too much!
Be quiet, you'd do yourself a favor if you listen to that, it's fabulous!
I don't know what it is.
You don't have enough Kashes.
Good day, if you like an item, move in front of it and use the ACTION command.
Thief!
Ouch!
Gas for 10 voyages costs 40 Kashes.
Let me see some identification please!
It's weird this sign that appears, I paint over it regularly but it comes back every time.
Good day.
Where do you want to go?
To Tippett island.
To Fortress island.
To the Hamalayi mountains.
I'm staying here.
The telepod's activating pedals are fragile. Stop jumping on them!
No more gas
Where do you want to go Twinsen ?
Welcome to Brundle island.
Alert!
Go ahead!
Clever, now there is no longer a sign on the wall.
Get out of here without breaking anything and we'll take it into consideration!
I'm looking for the plans of the Teleportation Center.
I don't know where they are.

I have you at last! I see that you appreciated the clone that I made of your friend, the original is safe. @ I suppose that you have come here to find the 3rd Runic Stone. I already found it a long time ago, but it took some time to decipher it. And as soon as I knew the location of the Well of Sendell, I began the foraging work. @

Not being able to destroy the stone, I built my fortress around it to dissimulate it. That reminds me, you supposedly destroyed two of my factories, but that is of little importance! I will soon possess such fantastic powers, that I will need but an instant to clone or teleport the totality of the inhabitants of the planet. I also can make you relive the worst moments of your existence indefinitely... @ Good bye, you will never realize the prophecy because I will be the one who encounters Sendell and I will inherit her powers.
I am the stone of the Septentrion. The Well of Sendell is located at the summit of the rocky peak that is at the center of Polar island. Only the Heir can break the seal that bars the entrance.
Help Twinsen ! They found the Runic Stone and I ...
Ah, there you are at last my love!
I don't know where they are, but hurry up because FunFrock is going...
Don't know who rigged the telepods, I just succeeded in picking the lock of my cell, and I ended up here!
Their teleportation thingamajig is all smashed up. I was walking, minding my own business, in the Hamalayi mountains, and suddenly I end up here!
Hi
Stop fidgeting prisoner Twinsen!
A prisoner is escaping! @ Sound the alarm!
You've just rediscovered all the objects in your inventory!
Good day.
Dr FunFrock's secret Fortress. You shouldn't even be reading that!
Hmmm, what if I tried to attract a guard's attention?
You are being held here because you are a troublemaker. We know from an informant that you claim to have prophetic dreams. @ Calm down, we're going to dissect... uh, I mean take care of you!
Uh ... Hi!
Training pool. Do not throw anything to the shark!
Draining valve. DO NOT TOUCH!
To Tippett island.
To Brundle island.
To the Hamalayi mountains.
I'm staying here.
Where do you want to go Twinsen ?

I know that symbol on your medallion. Virgul, our sorcerer, told us about your coming, and we have often prayed in front of the Runic Stone, which carries the same symbol. Unfortunately, Dr. FunFrock found it and built his fortress right over it, although the Rock was supposed to be indestructible! I would dig a tunnel for you so that you could enter the building, but you must first sabotage the Teleportation Center. Go find the plans of this center, I can dig only after all the telepods have been neutralized!
I don't know where they are, but with these plans you must enter the Center on Brundle island and then sabotage it. Then I can dig under the Fortress!
Go to Brundle island, get in the Center and neutralize the telepods control system.
Good going, the telepods are no longer working, follow me!
You're the one that's making life difficult for FunFrock? He recently threw a tantrum that could be heard from here. Since then, he brought in several telepods, he's worried about his fortress.
You have once again angered FunFrock, he screamed a little while ago! What did you break this time, you know that he hates you?
I don't know where they are, ask your flying animal over there. In fact, can you eat that animal?
We no longer fear the threat of the teleportations, but you must get rid of the guards and the assault tank for us. I will then be able to dig.
Good luck!
Get out!
Twinsen help! I'm not a clone, it's me, the real Zoé.

You must break the seal so that I can enter the Well of Sendell. None of my machines could drill through this rock, it resists me, just like the Runic Stone. I began digging around the rocky peak, but it will take months for me to reach the center of the planet! You'll see, I will realize the prophecy myself, and I'll take good care of this planet. Break the seal and I'll spare you Twinsen, you and your friend.
I will at last see Sendell's face. If everything goes as planned, I'll make you my jester when I come back. Ha, ha, ha!
Before you destroy the cloning factory, I prepared THIS for you!
At last, you took your time, my love. I'm not escorted by two groboclones, but I promise that it's really me. Go find Sendell and then we'll go home.
Good day.

I am Sendell, like all of those you see here, we are all Sendells. We are here to watch over a stellar entity that is in gestation, it will come into existence in a few centuries. As we can only act from the heart of the planet, we implanted a lineage of elected creatures among the species living on the surface. You are the current descendant of this family, and when FunFrock's threat had become too great, it was me that called to you in your dreams. The entity can now finish its gestation because you rid us of FunFrock. It would have died if he had gotten to it, and this world would have imploded, thanks to you it will continue to flourish. Return now to the surface, you can now erase the final traces that he left there.
Twinsen, NO! We are finished, don't let him reach us!
Uh ... you might be surprised when you discover the house.
What are you doing there? The route that connects the 2 islands is classified top secret.
Can't start this machine without an ignition key!
Here, little guy, take the ignition key and bring the bulldozer back for me - I'll appreciate it. I don't have time to do it myself.
This work is not moving along fast!
What are you doing here? This sector is off limits to the public.
Halt!
Stop squirming, prisoner Twinsen!
Hey, you! You're not one of my nurses! Sound the alarm!
Good day, fellow nurse.
A prisoner has escaped! @ Sound the alarm!
RULE# 1024-GH : @ Dr. FunFrock reminds you that it is absolutely forbidden to make any allusion whatsoever to the so called Legend.
Long live the venerable Dr. FunFrock, the one who saved us from all the superstitions.
Hmmmmm... what if I try to get the guard's attention?
Good day
You've returned at last, my love! Come inside quickly - all the clones must be looking for you.
Twinsen, where were you? I was worried sick!
I've just escaped from the asylum. They think that I am a trouble maker because of the strange dreams I have, the ones where Sendell is calling me. I spoke to you about them on several occasions.
I rummage around here as there's no one guarding this place. I hide in the truck so that the guards won't see me. You just have to jump into the pile of garbage and be VERY DISCREET about it.
Hi! What are you doing there? Did you know that you can read the posters? All you have to do is move in front of one and use the ACTION command while in normal mode.
Uhhh ... How's it going?
I know where they went and I'll help you if you buy me a drink. Ask the waiter about it.
You're being held here because you are a trouble maker. An informant told us that you claim to have prophetic dreams. @ Calm down, we're going to dissect... uh, I mean... take care of you!
Ok, I just have to wait for the truck to move into place.
It is forbidden to travel outside the Citadel in that kind of attire!
Twinsen! What are you doing here? I heard you were arrested only yesterday!
They let me out early for good behavior!
Impossible! Nobody gets out of the Citadel alive!
ANNOUNCEMENT #357-G: @ A new automatic surveillance device is now operating in the city. All citizens must remain motionless if one of these devices is in their vicinity.
It is forbidden to use that robot !
You look kind of lost, Mr. Nurse. Use your holomap if you don't know how to get back home!
Welcome aboard! You have picked a wonderful day for travelling, the weather is beautiful!
I think it's time to make use of what you hid in the house.
Open up! We know you're in there!
You are charged with aiding an escapee. Follow us!
I'm looking for a young girl. She is being escorted by two groboclones.
Sound the alarm! It's the escapee!
I believe that you can read all the posters. All you have to do is move in front of one and use the ACTION command while in normal mode. I can't really help you out, because I don't know how to read!
I haven't seen them. @ Sorry!
I saw them at the port a little while ago. They were leaving for another island. It's strange, because prisoners usually stay at the Citadel.
You need a ticket to board the ferry. You can buy one next door.
Good day, one ticket for... Sound the alarm! It's the escapee!

I've had it up to my trunk! There are 4 crates in the warehouse that I cannot seem to arrange on the 4 crosses painted on the ground. I would gladly give a ferry ticket to anyone who could help me out of this mess.
Hey! You over there, come here!

I can't open this chest with this blasted trick back of mine! Gimme a hand and I'll let you keep some of what's inside. All you have to do is move in front of the chest while in normal mode and use the ACTION command. You can do the same for rummaging through lots of things like cupboards, garbage cans, etc...

My son and I fixed the ventilation flap in your chimney. We'll put up a fence later. It's odd that it is so far away from your house! According to my son, who is an architect, there are a lot of strange things about your house!
You know, don't worry about putting up a fence around the chimney. I've thought about it and I prefer to keep it as it is.
Good day.
Try the tavern, you never know...
The crates are arranged correctly this time. Thank you, and please accept this ferry ticket as a token of my gratitude.
I'm on special assignment for the good Dr. FunFrock, and am looking for the plans of the Teleportation Center.
Come in friend! We will look at them together because they are rather complicated.

I was put in charge of verifying this building because it was built over ruins that are marked with a strange symbol. It seems that a mad man is attacking different sites also marked with this same symbol. All this extra work has really ruined my weekend! @ We're really worried about the Teleportation Center: it's weak point is situated on the left, right after the first guard post.
You will need my card to get into the center. It is on the drawing table. If you do succeed in catching this vandal with his weird Horn, I would appreciate it if you would kick his rear end for me!
Go ask my son, he has come home from work. Sorry about your house: the clones came with an attack tank, and they were looking for you!
I would like to buy a drink for the grobo upstairs.
Very good sir, but that will cost you 10 Kashes per drink.
Hide! They have itchy trigger fingers!
Keep the planet clean!
Let's see now, where did I put my key?
Dad! Do you have a key with you?
All you have to do is ask.
I've got to get into the Teleportation Center.
You don't have to be aggressive all the time. I don't talk to pushy people!
10 Kashes! That's too expensive!
You've just got back all the objects that were in your inventory!
Don't ever try teleporting yourself - it's very dangerous! Only the clones can do it.
Welcome to Lupin-Burg @ (Citadel Island).
Yeah, the clones already confiscated the key to my cellar, so don't be surprised when they come back to close down the tavern!
Welcome to Citadel Island
We are going to close this tavern down. Get out of here!
Good day, this talk about the Legend is strange, don't you think?
The 4 crates are not on the 4 crosses, try again!
I don't know anything about it, and it is forbidden to talk about it!
I saw them! They left for another island, but I don't know which one.
It is forbidden to talk about it!
Bah! That doesn't interest me. Go see at the library or go drown your sorrows at the tavern; or even better, do it the other way around.
What's strange is that you're talking about it. That's forbidden, you know!
I don't know. The books that mention it have been confiscated and sent to Principal Island.
It is forbidden to talk about that!
Prisoner Twinsen, I've already had enough of seeing you here, so don't make any more problems for yourself!
A piece of advice: surrender instead of trying to provoke us.
You are not going to get away by evoking that subversive propaganda.
I'm a bartender, you know, so I've have had my fill of bar jokes and strange stories!
I don't know anything about it, but the tavern will soon be closed down. That's been confirmed!
Good day
Well, I don't know anything about it. But you could offer me a drink anyway?

This room contains information and weapons that were amassed for generations to help the Heir who will, one day, be chosen from our descendants. The key to the room was passed down from generation to generation, but our ancestor Hégésippe was the last family member to retain the key. He was attacked and killed by the ruthless pirate LeBorgne during a sea voyage. Nobody knows where Leborgne's treasure, which undoubtedly contains the golden key to the room, is today." 

You who read this text, know that there are 3 Runic Stones in this world. Their locations are now indicated on your Holomap. They are large menhirs with runic text written on them. They will help the Heir in his quest for Sendell. The third stone will show the exact location of the Well of Sendell. In addition to the help provided by the text, each stone conceals a secret.
Bug street @ (Citadel Island).
It's ok, let's go!
You don't have enough Kashes, come back later!
Good day
Life candy: do you want 10 hearts for 10 Kashes?
Ok, I'll take them.
No, thank you.
Not enough Kashes!
Good day, I would like some information about LeBorgne the pirate.
L.B.A. @ Lupin-Burg sewer service @ Little Vachond street
L.B.A. @ Lupin-Burg sewer service @ Dr FunFrock Square
Halt!
Hey, you! You're not one of my nurses! Sound the alarm!
Good day, fellow nurse.
Good day, fellow nurse.
A prisoner is escaping! @ Sound the alarm!
A prisoner is escaping! @ Sound the alarm!
A prisoner is escaping! @ Sound the alarm!
Good day, neighbor.
Good day, neighbor.
Good day
Good day
Good day
Hey buddy!
Good day
Good day
You are being held here because you are a trouble maker.
Hey, Mr. Nurse! Use your holomap if you're lost.
You know, the holomap is activated by the "H" key. And you'd better try to get it back or buy another one at the bazaar on Principal Island.
I haven't seen them. @ @ Sorry!
I'd like to help you, but I haven't seen them.
I haven't seen them. @ @ Sorry!
Didn't see 'em. I ain't budged an inch!
I didn't see them. Try at the tavern, you never know...
I haven't seen anyone, but ask inside the tavern.
You need a ticket to board the ferry. You can buy one next door.
Leave me alone, I have nothing to say to you.
Try the tavern, you never know.
Try the tavern, that sounds like something they would be familiar with.
Don't get all excited, son! I prefer talking calmly.
Calm down quickly! If you are going to be like that, I won't speak to you any more.
Did you know that the telepods are dangerous for all species? Only the clones can use them!
A piece of advice: surrender instead of provoking us.
Quiet!
Thanks, mate!
I was trying to dig a tunnel, but the noise tipped them off!
Where do you want to go?
To Principal Island
To the White Leaf Desert
To Proxima Island
To Rebellion Island
I'm staying here!
Bah! That doesn't interest me.
Hi!
Sorry, I haven't seen her!
I don't know what those things are!
Yes... Hey, stop talking about it, ok? That's a sure way to wind up in the Citadel.
I don't know what that is all about.
I know that LeBorgne had some kind of a captain's log written for him (he was practically illiterate), and the boss of the tavern on Principal Island knows where it is!
They took a fast boat a little while ago. Destination unknown.
One day, one of my swabs claimed that LeBorgne was an ancestor of mine and... well, you know how dramatic burials at sea can be!
I can't help you out, my friend. Don't know what you're talking about.
That's none of your business!
Ask the sailor, he would have know who LeBorgne was.
Not me!
Bah, you think so? And in the first place, I don't know it.
Asks one of my colleagues working in the warehouse on the port. He will know about this LeBorgne.
There is a library on Principal Island, but I don't know if they have any books about the Legend there.
I don't know anything about that story.
Sorry, but I don't know what that could be about.
Don't know him!
I was not informed about this mission!
Really! Well that's too bad, but I don't know anything about it.
I've never seen those plans.
What legend? I don't know about any legend!
Good day
Ask a sailor that type of question.
Sorry, I don't know where they are.
Bah! That holds little interest for me.
That's in the past now, there are no pirates living today.
Sorry, but I don't know what that could be about.
I didn't see them, but try asking at the tavern.
Never heard anything about it!
I'm looking for the plans of the Teleportation Center - I'm on a special assignment!
I haven't seen them. @ @ Sorry!
Sorry neighbor, I don't know what you're talking about.
Try over at the port, all the sailors knew that pirate.
Good day, I'm looking for a friend. She is escorted by two groboclones.
I didn't see her, but if she was arrested, where she is, surely isn't any of your business!
I don't know what you are talking about.
Can I see your ferry ticket please?
Ask a sailor, he might be able to help you.
I don't know where they are.
I haven't seen them.
If you still want to take the ferry, I can sell you some tickets for only 5 kashes each. I print them up myself.
You don't have enough Kashes, come back later.
No more gas.
Sorry, but someone came by for the robot. Apparently, they needed it at a top secret construction site.
Halt!
Good day, I'm looking for a friend. She is escorted by two groboclones.
Sorry, I didn't see them but try going to the astronomer's house in the Old Burg; he knows a lot about what is going on.
It is forbidden to talk about that!
If you want to see my cousin, go in front of the sink and wash your hands! Ha ha!
I was arrested for sneezing in public, it's ridiculous! There's also, however, a forger in the cell to the right of general headquarters.

I can't help you. Except perhaps... considering the risks you've taken, I guess I can trust you. I was arrested on this island, but earlier on I gave a fake red card to my brother who was living on Proxima island. He will give it to you if you say "Amos" to him (the location of the house is now indicated on your Holomap).
Dr. FUNFROCK's headquarters. Access IS FORBIDDEN!
Young male quetch seeks young female rabbibunny for friendship (and maybe more...)
Bah! Not interested.
As I live and breathe, you will never see me drink any tap water in this city, mate. And all you have to do is drink some of it to understand why!
That old pirate is right, the tap water tastes funny. They should be able to improve its quality, and by the way the water tower is located in the North mountains (check your holomap).
The Legend is a weak spot in FunFrock's power. You must discover why; it's the only way of seeing your friend again.
Good day, this talk about the Legend is strange, don't you think?
ANNOUNCEMENT #358-G : A prisoner named Twinsen has escaped from the Citadel. Anyone seeing the escapee must notify the nearest clone.
Opening hours for the Principal Island library: @ More or less, all the time.
We have some documents on the "Legend" somewhere in the Censored Publications Department, but you need special authorization to look at them. Let me see your ID card.
Good day. You need a boarding ticket to go to Citadel Island.

My dear and respected Dr. FunFrock, I took the plans of the Teleportation Center home with me, to work on them over the week-end. I will bring them back on Monday. Signed: Mies Van der Rooh, Architect, Bug Street, Citadel Island.
I'm interested in the story of LeBorgne the pirate.
I'm looking for the plans of the Teleportation Center. I'm on a special assignment!
Sound the alarm! It's the escapee!
Good day
A ferry ticket costs 10 kashes. However as I have a WANTED poster in my office, you will have to pay 30 Kashes to make me overlook the fact that you look a lot like the guy on it.
Halt! You are a wanted escapee!
If you give me 10 Kashes I'll let you read the poster behind me.
I saw them a little while ago on Citadel Island. But they left on a fast boat. Destination unknown!
Welcome, dear customer! I don't have any more cherry flavored syrup, but there is a pharmacy open on Citadel Island. @P Move in front of the item that interests you and use the ACTION command.
Mister, Mister! There's a loose stone in the back wall. I might be able to escape!
A loose stone? Let me see that.
The passage will only open when you come from my cousin's house. Now stop rummaging everywhere!
Sorry, but you don't have enough Kashes. Come back later.
Here you can't just talk to just anybody. Prove that you are not working for FunFrock. Go clobber a clone for starters!
Didn't see anything, but if you have any problems, you should talk to the Astronomer who is under house arrest, up above the Old Burg.
So you're the one that beats up on clones? Good job! I haven't seen your friend but you should go see the Astronomer. He will certainly be able to help you.
Leave me alone, this job is already hard enough.

This young girl must be someone important if that tyrant FunFrock is holding her outside of Citadel Island. Something funny is going on with this forbidding of any talk about the Legend: this must be some kind of weakness in his power! Find out what is behind this Legend, it's your only hope of seeing your friend again. If you need to leave the island, I know a friend who can help you at Port-Belooga (check your holomap). Tell him that I sent you. And be discreet in your quest.
Unfortunately, I don't know anything about the Legend, but I have a fisherman friend who could help you in your travels if you tell him that I sent you. He lives at Port-Belooga (check your holomap).
Ha ha! It's a colleague, he's looking for a wife.
I don't know anything about it, and anyway, it's a forbidden subject.

According to my doctor, I can drink only the city's tap water. But it tastes too bad. If someone could improve its taste, I would be willing to show him the Censored Publication Department, and that would be quite a privilege.
Hold on a minute, I'm going to taste the water.
Hmmmmm, cherry flavor, not bad... but I would have preferred carrot. But anyway, as promised, I will show you where the documents about the "Legend" are.
Never saw 'em! The sea is my only concern. @ Sometimes I even take voyagers on my boat, but only people that I can trust.
If the Astronomer sent you, I guess I can trust you. Despite the solidarity in the resistance against FunFrock, you know, times are hard. For 10 Kashes I'll take you where you want to go.
I don't know yet.
To the White Leaf Desert.
I'm not going to leave just yet.
You don't have enough Kashes to make the trip Twinsen. See you later!

In the distant past, when the spheros, rabbibunnies, Quetches and grobos emerged from the original primordial soup, centuries before Dr. FunFrock's coup, a prophecy was pronounced. Its text is hardly remembered today and that is why people now refer to it as the "Legend". It explained how "the Heir," when his time had come, would be called to overthrow a tyrant! The secret of the Legend can still be learned somewhere in the White Leaf Desert.
You've just got back all the objects that were in your inventory!
You can come aboard sir, we were just getting underway.
Welcome to Principal Island.
I didn't see her, but I think that I can trust you now. Follow me, I know how to get to the Astronomer's home.
My cousin is a locksmith. He will open the unguarded door for you. Follow me!
I don't know if I can help you. I am a locksmith and I can open doors... but only for people that I can trust!
If you already know about that passage, I can open the unguarded door for you. After you!
I can help you get rid of the Supergro. Follow me, but wait until he moves away from the steps before going by!
Thief! @ Leave my money box alone!
You are too aggressive! Get out of here, and don't come back until you have calmed down!
Shut up stupid, it is forbidden to talk about it!
Principal island sanitation department: NO SWIMMING!
Where do you want to go?
To Port-Belooga.
To the water tower.
I'm paying to see!
No way, this smells like a scam!

I can guide you through the Censored Publications Department. There is one book that talks about the Legend. I could show it to you, but first, I would like you to change the taste of the tap water, here in the city. It is the only type of water that I am allowed to drink, and it is really disgusting.
Old Burg @ (Principal island)
Peg Leg Street @ (Principal island)
Sorry, but you don't have enough Kashes. Come back later.
To Proxima Island.
I read some of the Captain's log - LeBorgne was ruthless! If you are still interested, the log is on sale at the Old Burg bazaar, on this island.
I am Bob Vortix, astronomer under house arrest. What are you doing in town, apart from beating up clones?
The Astronomer sent me.
Come back when you know where you want to go.
Life candy: would you like 10 hearts for 10 Kashes?
Ok, I'll buy.
No, thank you.
Not enough Kashes!
Good day. Come this way, I'll open the door for you.
Sound the alarm! A prisoner is escaping!
My poor friend! I really don't know what you are talking about.

You know Julia? She is a nice girl. She watches a bit too much TV, but there is some truth in her story: someone left a box for clover leaves on the islet in front of my house. It is too shallow for a boat to get there by water, and since the bridge leading to the islet has collapsed, the only way to get there is to fly.
Very good sir, wait here please.
What are you doing there, who are you?
I'm fixing the antennas.
Twinsen, I'm escaping.
Santa Claus.
Welcome to Port-Belooga @ (Principal Island) @ Sea calm to choppy, gusty winds.
I'm not interested.
I'll buy.
Good day
L.B.A. @ Old Burg Sewer service. Emerald Moon Street.
Feel free to look through my stuff, creep!
She's not here. I would have noticed her. We don't have many readers these days.
I've been all over the island today, and I haven't seen those people.
I didn't see her.
I didn't see her.
Sorry. I haven't seen your trio.
I didn't see her, but ...
The water is drinkable, but it is true that it tastes funny. You'll have to go to the water tower if you want to change something.
Good day
Good day, mate.
Bye, say hi to my cousin when you see him.
Good day
Sorry, but you don't have enough Kashes. Come back later.
We don't trust people easily here. Prove that you don't work for FunFrock, clobber a clone!
To Citadel Island.
To Rebellion Island.
Here it is: like new, good handling and fast, this catamaran is for you!... for 200 Kashes.
Too expensive for my blood!
Great, I'll take it.
Not enough Kashes!

I've got to tell you something. It's awful! My best friend (Beatrice) is in love with Steven. But Paul, Steven's half brother, left Cindy when Linda got out of the clinic after her bobsleigh accident. But not for Linda, for Tatjana! Only Serge (who secretly admires Steven) has been trying for months to win the love of Tatjana who refuses to talk to Christy since she died. All the while Stephanie - who remarried Serge - discovered the letter from Paulina in which she explained where was the box of clover leaves left behind by Roy. So, evidently, Beatrice wonders if Linda knows about the accident. @ You get all that?
Wake up, I've just found the escapee!
Thief! @ @ Leave my money box alone!
Sorry dear customer, but all that interests me is my modest concern.
Fool, don't do that! ANYTHING can happen now!

Ha, ha! You too are looking for his treasure? Well, I sure once had an old dusty book about LeBorgne, but a customer bought it this morning. It was a rabbibunny. I know that he works over at the library.

I have not seen this young lady. But go over to the Astronomer's house. Even though he is not allowed to leave his own house, he knows everything. He lives in the last house on the hill overlooking the city.
It tastes EXACTLY the same as before. I won't guide you through the library.
Did you know that a wise guy dumped some syrup into the island's water supply? I'd like to find that guy so that I can give him a piece of my mind. You wouldn't happen to know him, would you?
It was me! Not bad, huh?
Probably another FunFrock stunt.

Bravo! This little twinge of cherry is fantastic. Ever since my doctor told me that I could only drink tap water and... well you know all that. In gratitude, I can show you all the ancient works that are here, even the LEGENDARY ones!
Oh, so Dr. FunFrock is taking care of us now. Funny, I find it hard to believe that it was him.
I have not seen this person.

My dear sir, I have been looking for Captain LeBorgne's log for years now. And would you believe that I found it today while shopping in the Old Burg? Naturally, such a piece should be consulted on site. Go look on the table in the back of the room next to the projection room.
Wait here, I'll go get them for you.
We must have something about LeBorgne. Go check with the chief librarian. You know him already, he's a rather large, orange rabbibunny.
Ok, I'll read you an extract from this book if you promise to leave me alone. What do you want me to read about?
Pirate recipes.
Leborgne's treasure.
Why LeBorgne?
As you know, this is a French game, and our respect for the culinary arts prevents us from revealing the ingredients used in pirate recipes. 

To find Captain LeBorgne's treasure, the voyager who arrives at the port of Proxima island must use the closest mooring post as a guide. With his back to the docked boats, he must follow these instructions in DISCREET mode: @ 6 steps to the North (straight ahead), then 6 steps to the East (to his right), following the gradual slope. 2 steps to the North (straight ahead) until he reaches the metal garbage can, 3 steps to the East (to his right) until he arrives at a light post. He must stand EXACTLY between the 2 lamp posts, and then take 8 steps to the North until he arrives at a gate. Captain LeBorgne's treasure is in the building behind the gate."
That was his nickname because he was always chewing an old toothpick. One day, during a typhoon, he sneezed: he found his toothpick, but lost an eye!
There's no need to be aggressive, I was here before you!
Good day!
I don't know where they could be.
This is rebellion, it is forbidden to speak of that Legend!
I didn't see her, but the Astronomer will certainly be able to help you.
You should talk to the sailors about that kind of story.
I'd like to help you, but I don't know where they are.
Hmmh! Quite a character that LeBorgne, he scoured the entire hemisphere a few hundred years ago. My fisherman friend told me that the Bazaar is selling an object that belonged to LeBorgne.
I don't know where they are.
Hiiii hi ! Bbbrrfff !
One of my colleagues was galloping at full speed across the White Leaf Desert and he said that he saw someone locked up in a grotto, behind a giant symbol of some kind.
Never heard anything about it!
What's a Teleportation Center?
Hi!
Ah! That LeBorgne was quite a man!
Ha ha, that's a good one! Sorry I don't have any with me.
Can't seem to sell a single hair dryer here. One of my colleagues is already out there trying his best. If this keeps up, I'll have to move on to another island.
I don't know where they are.
I cannot help you, my friend. Don't know what you are talking about.
Take that, rebel!
Move along!
Good day
Go to the tavern, they love pirate stories there!
Leave me alone, I have nothing to say.
Good day
It is strictly forbidden to talk about that!
Never heard anything about it.
I don't know where they are.
Sorry, I don't know what you're talking about.
Hi!
Calm down!
I didn't see her.
Look, you seem like a nice guy, but you're a big boy now. Figure it out for yourself, I'm not a library!
I don't know anything about all that.
I didn't see her.
I don't know where they could be.
Pirates, phooey! Those sailors will say anything to get someone to buy them a drink!
Good day
30 Kashes for a hair dryer, how about that? I normally sell them door to door, but customers are sparse, and you seem nice enough.
Come in!
Good day, my good sir.
No. Not at all.
Go see Beatrice and tell her that Julia sent you. She'll explain all that better than I can. She lives on the outskirts of the Old Burg, in a house next to the sea, on Peg Leg Street.
Julia spoke a lot about you.
I don't know anything about pirating, try talking to the sailors instead.
I don't know where they are, kind sir.
Good day, young quetch.
I didn't see her.
I don't know what you're talking about!
They say that the tap water tastes better now. Great! Another publicity stunt from the anti-alcohol foundation.
I never saw 'em
I don't know her, but go see Wadbull over at the bazaar. And be careful... normally it is forbidden to talk about that!
Ah, I never heard that one. But the one about the pirate that had rheumatisms in one leg and termites in the other cracks me up every time!
Hi mate!
I don't know where they are.
LeBorgne! Since he didn't know how to read, he had his cook write the Captain's log. I know that it is for sale at the bazaar next door.
Sorry, I don't know anything about that.
This super Holomap costs only 20 Kashes (you will find that it is very useful!).
Gas for 10 voyages costs 30 Kashes.
15 hearts of life powder will cost you 30 Kashes.
10 flasks of magic powder will cost you 30 Kashes.
A meca-penguin will cost you 3 Kashes.
I didn't see her.
Sorry, I never heard anything about that.
Hi friend.
I don't know where they are.
Good day
Ask the boss or the sailor at the table.
You know that it is forbidden to talk about that! But this is your lucky day: I'd most happily turn you in, but that would deprive me of a chance to line my pockets with your Kashes.
Good day
I'm a huge STAR WARS? fan. The saga's sequel should be released soon, so I already reserved my seat in the movie theater!
I'd like to help you, but I really don't know much, except about movies. Good luck!
I found this page ripped out of a book. It says "... pull the middle lever ONCE, then pull the right lever ONCE." This must be the answer to some kind of puzzle!
I don't know where they are. Sorry.
Good day
Ask the rabbibunny with the yellow T-shirt, he's the librarian.
Ow! But I found this page on the ground, I didn't rip it out. I promise!

According to the book I have, there is a "Clear water" lake in the Hamalayi mountains, somewhere to the North West of Principal Island. Did you know that the Hamalayi range is impossible to cross? It marks the border with the Northern hemisphere, the one that Dr. FunFrock cleared out. The sun is too hot for us over there: the temperature is unbearable, and the changes in climate caused the development of mutant monsters. And despite the fact that the good doctor spared us from all that, there are still rebels out there who want to overthrow him - it's shameful!
Sorry, I don't know what you're talking about.
Ask the librarian, he knows a lot about the history of LeBorgne.

Did you know that Dr. FunFrock installed busts of his effigy to protect us? The ones that don't have a pedestal are placed on ancient seals. Since these symbols were indestructible, at least the busts hide them now!
I don't know where they are.
Go see the librarian.
I never saw him, but try a little further up at the Bazaar. Wadbull knows a lot and he SELLS A BIT OF EVERYTHING!
Nobody remembers that nowadays. I even wonder if the library still has books about the Legend.
I don't know her. Sorry.
I don't know anything about it, but some people say that there used to be some books over at the library that spoke of it.
Stop doing that, you're going to put ashes everywhere!
Don't know where they are, but forget about it! Teleportation makes me sick.
Ewwwww! Teleportation makes me nauseous.
No more gas.
By the way - thanks, I have the red card!
You can't imagine what it's like to be locked up! @ It's awful... just awful!
I doubt that she is being held here.
Never heard anything about it.
They say that he was never captured!
Sorry, but I really don't know anything about it.
Drinking water for Principal Island: DO NOT THROW ANYTHING IN THE TANK!
Sorry dear customer, but this is a bazaar here, not a library!
No one remembers that stuff today, that's just a lot of bunk.
Well ... I don't know, but someone in the Old Burg must know something about this stupid Legend.
She's not being held here. But if you want my red card, go and see my brother. Our house's location is marked on your holomap.
I was just thinking as well, that I've seen this quetch somewhere before!
Go try at the Old Burg tavern, and talk to the bar tender.
Hi, I've just returned from a trip around this hemisphere and I'm selling my boat. Follow me if you're interested.
Good day, so you've been around the hemisphere? Watch out for the icebergs near the Hamalayi mountains!
You might get into trouble with the authorities if you carry this flag. It's a rebel's emblem.
Come here! Now that's a real sailor! LeBorgne had a log that must have contained the location of his treasure somewhere.
Never seen 'em, don't even know what you're talking about.
Well, well, what do we have here? A snooper? Twinsen I presume. I would like to know what you're doing here.
There's a treasure on this island: you must blow into a magic horn in front of FunFrock's bust to gain access to it.
I am not familiar with that story.
Here's your book.
Good day
Good day, all this talk about the Legend is strange, don't you think?

Very strange indeed. I'm just an old fool who would like to grow flowers in the desert, but... I know about this Legend that Dr. FunFrock forbade. I'll tell you what I know if you bring me a sacred book. It is in the Temple of Bù which was buried by a violent sand storm. You can still get in, however, through one of the ventilation shafts still visible just behind me. But be careful: there is danger everywhere!
This book is a keeper of knowledge. It allows you to read the rocks and to talk to the animals.
To Principal Island.
I'll leave later on.
I can get you to where you want to go for only 10 Kashes! Where do you want to go?
Sorry, Twinsen, you don't have enough Kashes.
To Citadel Island.
Thanks for opening the grotto. My name is Joe the Elf. I was locked up here because I wasn't meant to be in the story, there might have been some bugs in the game!
See you later, and thanks again.
You're too aggressive! Come back later when you've calmed down.
Ow, you crazy or what? You don't deserve to be an elf, give me your membership card!
Where do you want to go?
Home.
Proxima island.
Rebellion island.
Maritime Museum, rates: @ Children ... 3 Kashes @ Adults ... 5 Kashes. "
Welcome to Proxim-City @ (Proxima Island).
Guard post - open 24 hours a day. Do not disturb...
Appropriate attire required!
I'm looking for the plans of the Teleportation Center.
To Principal Island.
To Citadel Island.
We'll see about that later.
For 10 Kashes, where do you want to go, Twinsen ?
Sorry, you don't have enough Kashes. I've got kids to feed you know!
Good day, a ticket for the museum costs 5 Kashes. Would you like one?
Yes, I'll take one.
No, museums put me to sleep.
Sorry, but you don't have enough Kashes.
Rear starboard propeller of the FunFrock 2. It was lost when the ship was launched from Principal island. The boat ran out of gas three days later, and finally stopped turning around in circles.
Captain LeBorgne's treasure. This chest contains the fruits of a lifetime of dishonesty. It was seized by the IRS, the only predator known to this terrible pirate.
Loan shark. This species of shark belongs to the movie producer family.
Reed Boat or Quffa. Primitive boat made from weaved reeds.
Boarding cannon.
Oak barrel. Barrels such as this one were used to serve up the daily rations of rum to the sailors.
Bùian Mermaid. A fine example of the absurdity of ancient superstitions: this statue was found in the middle of a desert.
Lifeboat. Do not pierce, burn, or bring into contact with an incandescent object.
Life candies: would you like 10 hearts for 10 Kashes?
Ok, I'll take them.
No thank you.
Not enough Kashes !
Halt. It is forbidden to touch the exhibits.
Sound the alarm! It's the escapee!
Construction work. SLOW DOWN!
I am the Eclipse Stone. The password for the Marked Stone is "BURBS". Which word will free me?
I am the Marked Stone. The password for the Eclipse Stone is "GIZMO". Which word will free me?
I don't know.
BURBS
GIZMO
My brother was arrested and the house is under surveillance: phony red card traffic. Wait a minute, how did you get in here? And who are you?
My name is Twinsen. I met your brother. He is in jail but is fine for the moment. He told me to mention the word "Amos" to you.
My name is Twinsen and I am the Heir... @ voila, voila, voila.
Ah! Ok. Then you might need this.

I'm really happy for you, Twinsen! But my brother is being held in FunFrock's headquarters. His cell has a window that is right on the street. If you could tell me how he's doing, I will give you a red card in gratitude.
You've just rediscovered all the objects that are in your inventory!
L.B.A. @ Proxim-City sewer service @ Ferry Street
I've been trying to sell this hair dryer ever since I was on Principal island! Come on, I know you can use one for 30 Kashes.
You don't have enough Kashes, see you later.
I don't have anything else to sell!
Aah, I see that you too have come to Proxima island. You remember me, I sell hair dryers. Look, I'll sell you one for only 30 Kashes, but only because it's been a slow day.
Don't know what you're talking about.

I've been working on a Jet-Pack prototype for days now. It's a small reactor that harnesses onto your back and allows you to fly about. My problem is that my last test flight wreaked a bit of havoc on the garden wall. It is rather difficult to fine tune the motor's power. I need a rheostat like the one you find in a hair dryer. Do you think you can find one of those for me?
So you found a hair dryer? Great! I'll be with you in a minute, just let me install the rheostat.

Well it's not a Jet-Pack yet, it's still just a Proto-Pack. I would appreciate it if you could test it out to see how it works. You should be able to fly over the water if you approach it from a gently sloping beach. But don't jump! Will you test it for 10 Kashes?
How's the Proto-Pack coming along? Keep testing, I have a bunch of calculations to finish up. And be careful when approaching water: you can only fly by coming in from a gently sloping beach.
Our heroic clone troops are responding to the rising rebel threat with a series of bombardments.
Skull flag. Pirate emblem belonging to the famous pirate Captain LeBorgne. "
The museum's alarm system has been activated: we have evacuated the premises for your security. We will open up again later!
There was a false alarm at the museum. The only way out was through the sewers, but the grate was not moved, so we're reopening the building.
Good day.
Sorry, but you don't have enough Kashes.
Welcome, dear customer, and thank you for honoring my humble establishment with your presence. Move in front of the item that you desire and use the ACTION command.
Thief! @ @ Leave my money box alone!
You're too aggressive! Come back when you've calmed down a bit!
Where do you want to go?
Citadel Island.
The White Leaf Desert.
Rebellion Island.
Gas for 10 voyages costs 30 Kashes.
15 hearts of life powder will cost you 30 Kashes.
10 flasks of magic powder will cost you 30 Kashes.
One meca-pinguin costs 3 Kashes.
My brother is in one of the cells that has a window on the street, in FunFrock's headquarters. And you know, if you tell me how he is doing, I'll give you a red card.
I'm not interested.
I don't know where they are.
I don't know what you're talking about.
Don't touch the alarm button, the grobo is wiring it as we speak. And in any case, it is forbidden to touch it!
Then go to the museum. And along those lines, don't touch the alarm button on the wall! 

Well you can believe me if you want, but the museum is well protected! I just connected this button to the alarm system: the building is evacuated as soon as it is pressed. @ Only one or two automatic guards will remain. It also sets off a series of sensors under the wooden floor that will sound the alarm as soon as they detect even the slightest weight. You would have to be able to fly to move around in there!
I think you're going to get hit, if you keep playing with that button!
I know that they have something about him in the museum.
That name sounds familiar. Go visit the Maritime museum, I think that they have two objects that belonged to LeBorgne.
Oh yes, it's great!
What about my test flights? I'm not paying you to test your shoes!

I've been working on a Jet-Pack prototype for days now. It's a small reactor that is harnessed on the back and allows its user to fly about. My problem is that my latest flight test wreaked havoc on my Southern wall. So I'd like to borrow the rheostat in your hair dryer to fine tune the power of the motors (from looking at your hairdo, I don't think you really need the dryer, anyway). And if that works, I will have a job offer for you.

Well, well. It seems that you too have found an authentic secret map of Captain LeBorgne! Do me a favor would you? Give Lanktir, who lives next to the bazaar, back his coffee pot. I'm so ashamed, I should have given it back long ago.
Go try at the museum.
Hi!
I'm looking for information about LeBorgne the pirate.
No more gas.
Good day.

You must be Twinsen. Like you, we have rebelled against that madman FunFrock - and you saw what's left of the city. @ We don't believe that the Northern hemisphere has become uninhabitable like the propaganda says it has. There may even be some survivors living there who refused to be deported. This is why we have decided to take the road leading to the Okojo pass by force. It leads to the Northern hemisphere. Unfortunately, our leader, Colonel Kroptman, was captured during the attack. We believe that he is still being held in the small fort that guards the pass. Help us free him by raiding the fort. You will be able to get to the Northern hemisphere if you do so. Go back to the hangar, there is a commando waiting for you in the boat.
Go give your boss FunFrock this message for me, traitor!
Hi! If I take your flag to be representative of your intentions, I see that you too have chosen Liberty. Lieutenant Grap is down in the trench, go see him - he'll tell you where our leaders are.

So, young quetch, you've come to help in the fight against FunFrock? As you can see, this city has suffered because of our rebellion. We are constantly bombed, which is why our leaders have set their camp in the center of the island. You can take my buggy to go see them.
Welcome to... AAARRGHH ! @ @ ... glb
Where do you want to go?
To Citadel Island.
To Principal Island.
To the White Leaf Desert.
To Proxima island.
I'm staying here.
Go see Grap first if you want to drive. He's a rabbibunny and he's down in the trench.
Twinsen, you MUST SUCCEED in this mission. That fort is in a strategic position of the utmost importance. Once we've taken it, the two hemispheres can be united once again.

We're going to help you take the fort: you will guide me, and I'll follow you with my grenades! Whatever you do, wait for me before you change zones and don't forget to neutralize the emitter. We won't talk during the combats and if I bite it, another rebel will come and take my place, he'll wait for you at the landing site.
I'm looking for the plans of the Teleportation Center.
You're now one of us, Twinsen.
Be careful behind the wheel, this isn't a go cart!
Calm down! Save your strength for the clones.
Hey, you look familiar! I just came back from an infiltration mission in Proxim-City and I saw your mug on quite a few wanted posters.
I've heard about an underground city that the clones use as a meeting place. It's in the Northern hemisphere, on Tippet island. You should check it out!
Ask Grap. He's in the trench, he'll know where to find them.
The end is near for FunFrock.
You must wait for your partner when you change zones if you want to make it through this mission.
Thank you Twinsen, we couldn't have done it without you.
Try over at Funky-Town. You can buy anything over there!
No more gas.
To the Hamalayi mountains.
To the rebel camp.
To the harbour.
I haven't seen them. @ Sorry!
Good day.
You need me to get into the fort. Wait there!
Come with me, we'll continue in the tank!
I'll cover you - go free the Colonel.
Don't jive me, my predecessor was killed in combat! Well, I guess that's life, huh? Shall we go?
Quick, get me out of here!
Hey quetch, hell of a job. If you'd like to carry on down the corridor and, try to open the hatch at the end of the hall.

From this warehouse we send material to the other hemisphere, we use a shuttle that dates back to the old subway lines. I participated in its construction but I've been waiting for a ferry for two years... Two years!!
Yes, I know, you also want me to start the transporter. Ok, stand in front of it, I'll start it up.
I don't know what that could be all about.

I'm with the rebels who are fighting against FunFrock. We are currently trying to cross the Hamalayi mountains. Our leader, Colonel Kroptman, has been taken prisoner. Welcome aboard if you are joining the fight! Go see my friends on Rebellion island. They will let you dock only if you're displaying the proper emblem: a pirate flag with a skull.
Use the flag: attach it to your boat and you will be able to dock on Rebellion island. You will certainly be able to help us cross the Hamalayi mountains.
Hang on! Wait for you partner before trying to change zones. If you are having problems reaching the fort, try neutralizing the radar above the bunkers, in the zone where you landed.
You're a real hero, Twinsen ! Well uh ... I mean, thanks for freeing Colonel Kroptman.
Thanks to you, we are now in contact with the Northern hemisphere. And I've received some information about that black-market city, Funky-Town. You will surely find some information over there!
Hang in there Twinsen, your quest is almost over.
There are still a few clones left, but with Kroptman at the helm of the tank, we'll take the fort.
Ask the look-out further on down the road, he'll be able to help you.
No more gas.
Ah! I don't know where those plans are. You can find information about everything in Funky-Town, but this city will soon be destroyed by FunFrock.
Hey, get me out of here! Find a key quick!

I am Raymond-the-Elf, to show my gratitude, I will indicate the location of the Clear Water Lake to you. It is to the North-West, in the Hamalayi mountains (look on your Holomap). If you play the flute there, you will find an important element of the prophecy. And if you have a membership card you can show me, I've something else for you.

I am Raymond-the-Elf, to show my gratitude, I will indicate the location of the Clear Water Lake to you. It is to the North-West, in the Hamalayi mountains (look on your Holomap). If you play the flute there, you will find an important element of the prophecy. And in a grotto near the temple of Bù, you'll find one of my fellow elves, he'll be able to get you a blue card.
Hello fellow elf.
Never seen them, I don't know anything about teleportation.
Where do you want to go?
To Principal island.
To the White Leaf Desert.
To Proxima island.
To Rebellion island.
I'm staying here.
To Citadel island.
I'm looking for the plans for the Teleportation Center.
Hi, you should go see one of my fellow elves who is in the White Leaf Desert. He can give you a blue card.
What are you doing there? They're letting anyone in here now! I even captured an elf a little while ago. I don't know what to do with him, officially, that doesn't even exist!
Surrender!
Do you prefer to die on an empty stomach, or do you want something special for your last meal?
Too bad!
Not hungry!
You have not achieved a sufficient level of power to defeat the red clones. We will wait for your return.
Sound the alarm! A prisoner is escaping!
You've just rediscovered all the objects in your inventory!
Good day.
You have no business here, this factory is top secret!
Don't touch those buttons!
Hey, you, don't touch our kitchen!

Noble stranger, we will open the Door of the Sacred Carrot for you if you sabotage the mutant factory, from where the monsters that infest this hemisphere emerge. This door leads to the shore, and from there you can access all of this part of the planet.
The passage that I'm opening for you leads to a port, where the old subway that crossed the Hamalayi used to leave from.
Hey, you! Don't touch our k... oh, it's you! @ Good work, you have disabled the mutant factory! No more new monsters are being produced. By the way, what is your name, brave stranger?
No more gas.
Greetings! Our village is harassed by the mutants. But these monsters are not a result of the climate - they are produced in a nearby factory built by FunFrock.
This is not really a good time!
Thanks for your help. And, whatever you do, destroy the eggs if you are going in the factory! If you don't, new monsters will be produced and will come and attack the village.
I don't know what that could be all about.
Good day.
New monsters are still coming to the village: the factory has not been completely disabled!
And now, brave stranger Twinsen, follow me to the Door of the Sacred Carrot.
Twinsen
Thank you for saving this village, brave stranger Twinsen.
I don't know what that could be all about, brave stranger Twinsen.
It's so much calmer since you've come, do you really have to leave?
I'd like so much to help you, Twinsen.
Help!
Whew, safe!
Carrot, open up!
I'm looking for the plans for the Teleportation Center.
Did you know that there is a Clear Water lake very near here. It is located close to the Door of the Sacred Carrot and it has a close connection with a prophecy.
You will have to interrogate traffickers, people that are in this hemisphere in any case.
Where do you want to go?
To Tippett island.
To Fortress island.
To Brundle island.
I'm staying here.
Where do you want do go, Twinsen?
Ah, it's impossible to open without a blue card.
To the rabbibunny village.
To the mutant factory.
Leave me alone! I've got work to do, and no time to play!
Use your red card to use the skilift.
Sorry, I don't know where they are.
I don't know where they are.
Ok I will take care of it.
The job is done!
Ok, then go and come back to me when you are finished.
Good bye!
Lets talk about something else...
Show me your wares.
Thanks again for the help! What can I do for you?
So how is it going with my the crates?
I am sooo hungry. If you find something to feed me I promise to give you a ride. What do you think?
Ok I will try my best
So did you find something for me?
Thanks, come back as soon as you can. If I wait too long I will faint!
I might have found something for you...
Great, exactly what I was looking for. Thanks, and here is my promise.
No no, do you want to poison me?? Go find something suitable for a horse!
Bye!
I see. Let's talk about something else...
Do you know where I could find some food for a horse?
Did you have a look in the shop in town? They have a lot of stuff in there. They might have what you are looking for.
Thanks, I am going to have a look at it.
Let me see your wares...
I just got a new arrival of grain bags. I got a lot so I will make you a special price!
Welcome to my shop! Have a look around and tell me what you need.
You have to try out this Champagne. Cuvee speciale. Thats some strong stuff we got here.
Its time for celebration! Come over here I might have something for you.
Merry Christmas!
Happy new year!!
Don't mind me I am just an extra. They only put me there because I have a nice looking suit.
They are throwing a pretty big party over there. You might want to have a look at it!
I am stuck inside the ground ever since I uncovered this statue. Everybody is gone to the party without even noticing me! Could you please give me a hand?
Santa doesn't want to give me any gift... I am sure he is keeping all of them for himself!
Ho Ho Ho! Meeeery christmas kid! Have you been nice this year? Oh whatever, just choose a present and get yourself moving. The next pleeeaaase? Oh man I sooo start to hate this job...
Never seen a talking snowman?? Anyway you might want to talk to santa over there.
Bye
Lets talk about something else...
OK show me what you have...
Please please pleeeeaaaassse!! I was very nice this year...
We are going to play all night! Could you go fetch me some more coffee please.
This guitar is fabulous! It was totally worth the price I got from this weird ponytail guy.
Don't you see you are interrupting something... Go away!
Man. This is so good. I can't get enough of it!
Hey sweetie! What are you waiting for? Come to dance with us!
Why are you staring at me like that! Everybody needs to have a litle break from time to time. Anyway, tonight is party night. Let's dance baby!
We whish you a merry christmas...
Man... I have no idea what I am doing here. And this music is so loud... Anyway, want to have a drink?
And an happy new year!
Sorry - hips - I don't talk to funny looking strangers. buurps! You and your twin - hips - can leave me alone!
Yeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeehaaaaaah!!!!!!!
I just teleported back to the reality. The Lbanet team is giving you their best wishes for the new year! Cheers!
We whish you a merry christmas...
No you don't have what I want, please look for it.
